data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_68277dce415742c4a98883151c693a07.png

skilllist.skilldesc: When Rafaela is killed, she turns into a beam of <font color="a6aafb">Holy Light</font> and launches herself at her killer after a 2s delay. This attack deals <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> equal to 20% of the target's Max HP upon hit and can be blocked by other enemy heroes, dealing damage to them instead. This effect won't be triggered if the killer is a non-hero enemy or if they're too far away.

Rafaela strikes the three nearest enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Light of Retribution</font>, dealing them 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>, briefly revealing their positions, and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. Enemies hit by <font color="a6aafb">Light of Retribution</font> again within 5s will take 20% extra damage (this effect stacks up to 3 times).

Rafaela calls upon <font color="a6aafb">Holy Light</font>, restoring 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+35% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to nearby allied heroes, plus an additional 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+45% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to herself and the most injured allied hero in range. Also increases the Movement Speed of nearby allied heroes by 30% and grants Slow Immunity for 1s.

Every 20 point(s) of Magic Power will add 1% to the Movement Speed bonus.

Rafaela unleashes the true power of <font color="a6aafb">Holy Light</font> in the target direction, dealing 460<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a line and stunning them for 1.2s.

data.name: Rafaela

__data.skilldesc: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts 4s, restoring 2.5% Max HP every 0.4s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing <font color="62f8fe">Shield and HP Regen</font> effects received by 25% (this effect cannot stack).
__data.skilldesc_text: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts <Num3>s, restoring <%Num2> Max HP every <Num1>s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing [C2Shield and HP Regen] effects received by <%Num4> (this effect cannot stack).
__data.skilldescemblem: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts 4s, restoring 2.5% Max HP every 0.4s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing <font color="62f8fe">Shield and HP Regen</font> effects received by 25% (this effect cannot stack).

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+12% Healing Effect
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

data.story: An angel loved and respected by the people of this world.

assist.desc: When teamed up with Fighters like Freya and Lapu-Lapu, Rafaela can boost their offensive power and survivability.

strong.desc: Rafaela has great healing and decent mobility, and performs well against heroes that lack burst damage or mobility, such as Masha and Barats.

weak.desc: Rafaela struggles against bursty and agile Assassins, like Ling and Hayabusa.
